AboutMe.title: Who I am
AboutMe.text: My name is Igor Rocha, I am Front End Developer, I develop websites, blogs and ecommerces of high quality, with a focus on performace, responsiveness, animations and SEO. I am always looking to update myself with new technologies that emerge, so as to always innovate and be more efficient.
